channel.title: [RuneSource] Asgarnia Official Release
channel.description:
[center][img]http://i.imgur.com/LkD6A3N.png[/img]
Before you ask, I have permission to release this. You guys should really appreciate this source. A lot of time and work has been implemented over the past year or so by the whole development team. Enjoy!
Client Link:
[url=https://mega.co.nz/#!w5pllZba!bzp7_kA3-O8bcnS-k-XZ2QZ6qigPNS5TVtCZOp4d5xo]Client Download[/url]
Source Link:
[url=https://mega.co.nz/#!l54GjRxa!BCf7hkEBV8qp5B46YiBcLwD1kEgEIVjd2I4GLwgRa94]Source Download[/url] [/center]
[b]Short list of features:[/b]
● Python scripting engine handles most interactive content ● Fully resizeable + fullscreen client using 474 cache ● Clipped pathfinding ● Following with 'dancing' ● Perfect trading ● Perfect banking ● Crate searching for random rewards ● Sled riding ● Flying with the Bow-Sword ● Pet kitten's ● Crystal Key Chest ● Tons of small details of content! The list never ends!
[b]Skilling features: (Most of the skills listed are complete)[/b]
● Agility ● Cooking ● Crafting ● Fishing ● Fletching ● Herblore ● Mining ● Prayer ● Runecrafting ● Thieving ● Smithing (Interface just needs to be done) ● Woodcutting
[b]Current quests:[/b]
● Rune Mysteries ● Druidic Ritual ● Sheep Shearer ● Doric's Quest ● The Restless Ghost ● Cook's Assistant ● The Waterfall Quest
[b]Minigame features:[/b]
● TzHaar Fight Pits ● Duel Arena ● Mage Training Arena ● Castle Wars ● Barrows ● Some more extra things
[b]Combat features:[/b]
● Melee
- Extremely accurate maxhit formula corresponding to RuneScape. - Very accurate blocking/attacking delays - All special attacks on near perfect delays - Equipment bonus's & affects. (Barrows, Void Armor Ring of Life, Ring of Recoil, Berserker, etc.) - Proper animations for all weapons - Player poisoning which can be healed by a potion or a period of time
● Mage
- Perfect Defensive Autocasting - Perfect Modern spell magics with Autocasting - Perfect Ancient spell magics with Autocasting - Correct RuneScape Teleportation. [Requires runes] - All Miscellaneous spells (Telekinetic grab, confuse, weaken) - Perfect Tele-block, prayer will reduce time blocked
● Range
- Clipped Projectiles (Obsidian rings, darts, thrown-axe's) - Clipped long range following - All bows with correct bonuses and special attacks - All crossbows with correct bolt special effects, including Karil's c-bow - Perfect Dark bow "Decent of Dragons" special attack max-hit formula - Both attacks will ALWAYS hit - If using normal arrow types, the minimum hit will be 5 - If using Dragon Arrows, then the minimum hit will be 8 - Range praying effect - Using normal arrows, your max hit will be boosted by 30% - Using dragon arrows, your max hit will be boosted by 50%
[b]Picture information:[/b]

item.title: [RuneSource] Asgarnia Official Release
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

[quote=“Titanium_, post:75, topic:534170”][quote author=JavaTC link=topic=652965.msg4376684#msg4376684 date=1382250046]
http://the.earth.li/~sgtatham/putty/latest/x86/puttygen.exe
There’s a quick RSA key generator

Got them both running now, but the client won’t connect to the server.
[/quote]

If you want them done correctly you could just follow Nikki’s Tutorial on Rune-Server(R-S), as its just a file u put in the source, it generates 2 files, boom ur done.[/quote]
I already said I got it running

Read full topic

item.title: [RuneSource] Asgarnia Official Release
item.dc:creator: @JavaTC JavaTC
item.description:
@JavaTC wrote:

After getting it to work (with some help), I’ll go ahead and say it’s alright. It’s definitely only a base though, the eact opposite of a download and host for those wondering.

Put some work into it and it’ll be great.

Read full topic

item.title: [RuneSource] Asgarnia Official Release
item.dc:creator: @Docent Limits
item.description:
@Docent wrote:

[quote=“Anval, post:72, topic:534170”][quote author=Docent link=topic=652965.msg4377183#msg4377183 date=1382394796]

IM TELLING YOU hahaa thank fate someone else has the same issue.

I gave you guys the actual source and client. Now it’s your job to do what needs to be done. I’m not going to spoon feed everything to you guys. I’m too lazy to download it and see what the problem is. Make sure you go to the OPTIONS on the log in screen, and set it to LOCALHOST and not the LIVESERVER. That could be your problem.

The issue isn’t you spoonfeeding us, the issue is that the server simply doesn’t work, even with proper RSA keys.

Don’t release something and then say you’re too lazy to actually help people with something you’re apparently so adept with and not expect to be laughed at.
Hence why I hate Rune-Server.

Thanks Java
[/quote]

Then I will upload the source I used that works in a few. I just have to finish homework.[/quote]

Thanks man. Gl on homework.

Read full topic
